testSteps.description: Ricardo attempts to customize the results page view
Then Brand filter should be an element that is visible
Ricardo clicks on the Brand filter
Then shoes size filter should be an element that is visible
Ricardo clicks on the shoes size filter
Ricardo clicks on Options for sort results
Then displayed items question should be sorted by descending order
